Cottleston Pie

A tiny design studio

Dave Dawson is the founder of Cottleston Pie, located in New York City.

Currently working on

  • A website for a New York City film festival
  • A book review publication
  • Redesigning Typedia
  • Tackling a few of the UX issues on the Four Seasons website
